turns.answer: Question: What kind of relationship do you have with the mafia? Answer 'One day I had a big family with the mafia,' and answered 'Well, that's the mafia. They take care of us. It doesn't matter

turns.answer: I was under the influence of an hallucinogen. I have been told that it is not a hallucinogen but a hallucinogen can cause serious harm. It is not worth taking. You should call the police so you can go
